mapper.insert: INSERT INTO item ( item_name, price, description, picture_url, preview_url, reg_date ) VALUES ( #{itemName}, #{price}, #{description}, #{pictureUrl}, #{previewUrl}, now() )
mapper.select: SELECT item_id, item_name, price, description, picture_url, preview_url, reg_date, upd_date FROM item WHERE item_id = #{itemId}
mapper.update: UPDATE item SET item_name = #{itemName}, price = #{price}, description = #{description}, picture_url = #{pictureUrl}, preview_url = #{previewUrl}, upd_date = now() WHERE item_id = #{itemId}
mapper.select: SELECT item_id, item_name, price, description, picture_url, preview_url, reg_date, upd_date FROM item WHERE item_id > 0 ORDER BY item_id DESC
